name: Guise of Sunrise
description:
2d adventure, playing as a casual rhytm game.

A fascinating story about the slave, who found the strength to overcome a difficult path to freedom.

  • Narrative without text.
  • Post-apocalypse dystopia world without the sky.
  • PC First, without mobile.

Developer: "Morfus" team, Russia, Vladivostok.

  • Michael Rfdshir - Art, game design; @MichaelRfdshir
  • Michael Petrov - Programming, game design; @Famalgaut

And we will be happy to see feedback at rfdshir@gmail.com !

Demo was developed for #GamesJamDefold. And won in the nomination "innovative solutions in game design".
